_header: Queen of parage paradise repaired I-wis
Subjects: prayers, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, prayers to
_description: An orison to the Virgin Mary — two 3-line monorhyming stanzas with medial rhyme

BLHar1022.First Lines: Quene of parage paradyse repayred I wysseLyth of linage lere me heuenly blysse…
BLHar1022.Last Lines: …þat of al thynge comfortyng is & refreschyngPray þou our kynge he kepe vs in heuen a wonyng
